decision_conditions:
in accordance with plans: Supporting document- Condition 8: Local Car Parking Permit Scheme, Supporting document- Condition 5: Secured by Design, Supporting document- Condition 4: Materials

Materials 
•	Brickwork- Lambourne Multi.
•	Windows and doors- double-glazed. Powder coated aluminium in a dark grey colour. Coping to be Aluminium, dark grey, powder coated, matching window/door frames.
•	Balconies and balustrades- Iron railings are to be used for the balconies (Dark grey to match door & window frames) and are to be min. 1100mm high for safety
•	External guttering- Black upvc rainwater goods are to be used. Guttering to be concealed within the construction.
•	Shopfront glazing- All glazing to be double glazed & of a high quality. Any frames will be powder coated aluminium in a dark grey colour.
•	Shopfront signage- The signage of the ground floor commercial unit will consist of a white background with dark blue raised lettering & is to be lit from behind. 
•	Boundary treatment- fencing to be close boarded, 2.1m high & to incorporate a 300mm high trellis. If concrete posts and timber panels are used, then retaining straps will be required to prevent lifting for security.
•	Robust iron gate to garden amenity spaces, powder coated in dark grey/black finish 
•	Paving- The permeable paving blocks to be used will be ‘Marshals Driveline Priora’ in Brindle Red.
•	Front Boundary Wall- The brick wall that forms the boundary to the front of the property will consist of the same brick used on the main dwelling, ‘Lambourne Multi’.
description: Materials (Condition 4);Secured by Design (Condition 5); Local Car Parking Permit Scheme (Condition 8): Erection of a three storey building comprising of a commercial unit (A2) and three self-contained flats (1 x 2 bedroom and and 2 x 3 bedrom) with associated refuse storage, cycle storage and amenity space. (Summary).
